metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10019 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is an FPE in the functionPSOutputDev::checkPageSlice at PSOutputDev.cc for nStripes.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10019` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.8
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.8
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.8
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.8
libpoppler73 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.8
poppler-utils - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.8
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: xpdf package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
poppler package in esm-infra/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.62.0-2ubuntu2.8').
